title: Glaciate
data:
***Version [0.30](/0.30 "0.30")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| - | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | Conjures forth a mighty blast of ice. Creatures within its cone-shaped area of effect take damage, with higher damage being dealt to those close to the caster. Those hit by the blast are encased in ice, slowing their movement, and those killed by the blast may be frozen into solid blocks of ice. A significant portion of its damage bypasses cold resistance. |

**Glaciate** is a monster-only spell which creates a huge unavoidable blast of ice and freezing vapour. Like [Fire Storm](/Fire_Storm "Fire Storm"), it inflicts incredible damage, and it can pierce [cold](/Cold "Cold") [resistance](/Resistance "Resistance") well -- 50% damage is irresistible. Affected creatures will be [frozen](/Frozen "Frozen"), causing them to [move](/Movement "Movement") 4 [auts](/Aut "Aut") slower. Additionally, monsters killed by this spell may turn into [blocks of ice](/Blocks_of_ice "Blocks of ice") (which later melt, leaving no corpse).

The following enemies cast Glaciate:

- & [![Lom Lobon.png](/images/f/f6/Lom_Lobon.png)](/File:Lom_Lobon.png) **[Lom Lobon](/Lom_Lobon "Lom Lobon")** (10-132 damage)

The following enemies may be able to cast Glaciate, depending on their spell set:

- & [![Pandemonium lord.png](/images/c/c6/Pandemonium_lord.png)](/File:Pandemonium_lord.png) **[Pandemonium lord](/Pandemonium_lord "Pandemonium lord")** (3.4% chance)

## History

| [![Glaciate.png](/images/b/ba/Glaciate.png)](/File:Glaciate.png) Glaciate |                                                                           |
| :------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Level                                                                     | 9                                                                         |
| School1                                                                   | [Conjuration](/Conjurations "Conjurations")                               |
| School2                                                                   | [Ice](/Ice_Magic "Ice Magic")                                             |
| Source(s)                                                                 | - [Book of Annihilations](/Book_of_Annihilations "Book of Annihilations") |
| [Casting noise](/Spell_noise "Spell noise")                               | 9                                                                         |
| [Spell noise](/Spell_noise "Spell noise")                                 | 25                                                                        |

| Spell Details                           |                                                                                     |
| :-------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Damage Formula                          | 7d((66+3\*Power)/(7\*max(3,range)))                                                 |
| Max Damage                              | 7d32                                                                                |
| [Max Power](/Spell_power "Spell power") | 200                                                                                 |
| Range                                   | 6                                                                                   |
| Targeting                               | Beam                                                                                |
| To-hit                                  |                                                                                     |
| Special                                 | Area, [clouds of freezing vapour](/Freezing_Cloud "Freezing Cloud"), Slows movement |

- Prior to [0.30](/0.30 "0.30"), Glaciate was 60% irresistible.
- Prior to [0.25](/0.25 "0.25"), Glaciate was a level 9 Ice Magic / Conjurations spell that players could cast. It was replaced by a new level 9 Ice Magic spell, [Absolute Zero](/Absolute_Zero "Absolute Zero").
- Glaciate was introduced in [0.14](/0.14 "0.14"), replacing [Ice Storm](/Ice_Storm "Ice Storm").
html:
Glaciate

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.30: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
Conjures forth a mighty blast of ice. Creatures within its cone-shaped area of effect take damage, with higher damage being dealt to those close to the caster. Those hit by the blast are encased in ice, slowing their movement, and those killed by the blast may be frozen into solid blocks of ice. A significant portion of its damage bypasses cold resistance.

Glaciate is a monster-only spell which creates a huge unavoidable blast of ice and freezing vapour. Like Fire Storm, it inflicts incredible damage, and it can pierce cold resistance well -- 50% damage is irresistible. Affected creatures will be frozen, causing them to move 4 auts slower. Additionally, monsters killed by this spell may turn into blocks of ice (which later melt, leaving no corpse).

The following enemies cast Glaciate:

  • & Lom Lobon (10-132 damage)

The following enemies may be able to cast Glaciate, depending on their spell set:

  • & Pandemonium lord (3.4% chance)

History

 Glaciate
Level 9
School1 Conjuration
School2 Ice
Source(s)
  • Book of Annihilations
Casting noise 9
Spell noise 25
Spell Details
Damage Formula 7d((66+3*Power)/(7*max(3,range)))
Max Damage 7d32
Max Power 200
Range 6
Targeting Beam
To-hit
Special Area, clouds of freezing vapour, Slows movement
  • Prior to 0.30, Glaciate was 60% irresistible.
  • Prior to 0.25, Glaciate was a level 9 Ice Magic / Conjurations spell that players could cast. It was replaced by a new level 9 Ice Magic spell, Absolute Zero.
  • Glaciate was introduced in 0.14, replacing Ice Storm.
Retrieved from "http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Glaciate&oldid=68611"

Those hit by the blast are encased in ice, slowing their movement, and those killed by the blast may be frozen into solid blocks of ice. A significant portion of its damage bypasses cold resistance.}} '''Glaciate''' is a monster-only spell which creates a huge unavoidable blast of ice and freezing vapour. Like [[Fire Storm]], it inflicts incredible damage, and it can pierce [[cold]] [[resistance]] well -- 50% damage is irresistible. Affected creatures will be [[frozen]], causing them to [[movement|move]] 4 [[aut]]s slower. Additionally, monsters killed by this spell may turn into [[blocks of ice]] (which later melt, leaving no corpse). {{monsters with spell}} ==History== {{spell |name=Glaciate |level=9 |school1={{Conjurations}} |school2={{Ice Magic}} |school3= |sources=

It was replaced by a new level 9 Ice Magic spell, [[Absolute Zero]]. *Glaciate was introduced in [[0.14]], replacing [[Ice Storm]].
